name: Danielle Tollette
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hello my name is Danielle,  I am seeking a position with a reputable marijuana collective or grow/trim. I enjoy working with people and plants with room to grow on the employment ladder. I am responsible, tactical, reliable, resourceful and I love to take initiative when applicable. I personally think that I have a wonderful outgoing personality. I am very artsy and free spirited. I believe that I could bring grest engery/vibes, Fun, friendly, fast pace, tidyness, just all out greatness for the working environment.
I am very knowledgeable of different marijuana strands the difference between in the indica, sativa and hybrid. 
I know how to operate scales or weigh.
Grow and trimmer experience.
I have dispensary shop experience 
I have 12 years of customer service experience 
I am a fast learner And good at math 
I am very trustworthy experience with cash handling And also have been in charge of taking company deposits to the bank.
I appreciate your consideration And would love to work with a grow long term Because I believe I can make a career for myself and the medical marijuana industry.
OPEN AVAILABILITY!
